name: Kevin Power in Too Many Games
overview:
This game was exclusively sold at the TooManyGames 2016 convention and only 50 were available.

Our hero, Kevin Power, is fate for this years TooManyGames!!!

It's up to you to get Kevin Power to the convention safely while crushing as many Rival Vendors as you can!

However, there are Too Many People that want to prevent Kevin from getting to the Convention on time. Watch out for them! Don't forget to stop at Game Junkie stores along the way to sell the games you find.
